title: Illumina completes acquisition of SomaLogic, expanding its proteomics and multiomics footprint
summary: Illumina, Inc. announced that it has completed its acquisition of SomaLogic, a leader in data‑driven proteomics technology, marking a major step in expanding the company’s portfolio beyond DNA sequencing and into high‑throughput proteomic analysis. The acquisition was finalised on January 30, 2026 and brings SomaLogic’s technologies and teams into Illumina’s multiomics ecosystem. Under the terms of […] The post Illumina completes acquisition of SomaLogic, expanding its proteomics and multiomics footprint appeared first on Longevity.Technology.
